subject: Contributor application: nearly 10-year eToro copy trading track record
body:
Hi Seeking Alpha team,

I'd like to apply as a contributor. I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog — I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016, nearly 10 years, with real money, documenting everything across 335 YouTube videos and my website socialtradingvlog.com.

Proposed first article:

"Analysing eToro's Top Traders: What Separates Consistent Performers from Flash-in-the-Pan Returns"

I'd analyse the characteristics of top-performing Popular Investors on eToro using real data from my nearly 10 years on the platform, covering:

- Risk score patterns and what they actually mean for copiers
- Why high short-term returns are often a red flag
- The role of drawdown history in predicting future performance
- How eToro's Popular Investor incentive structure affects trader behaviour

My background: UK expat based in Malta, copy trading on eToro since 2016. I'm not a financial adviser — I'm a real user sharing documented experience, which I believe is exactly what readers are looking for.

Happy to discuss article ideas or submit a full draft.

Best regards,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://youtube.com/socialtrading
